summary: Provides a comprehensive test suite for the QDWH polar decomposition algorithm, checking mathematical properties such as Hermitian and unitary behavior, reconstruction accuracy, and compatibility with various input conditions and execution modes.
business_intent: Validate and guarantee the reliability of the QDWH implementation within a numerical linear algebra library, ensuring it works correctly across edge cases and integrates smoothly with just‑in‑time compilation for production deployments.
